localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: With code-ray you can fix bugs in your code faster and easier. You can set breakpoints to show the live state in different sections of your code. code-ray can be linked to GitHub, GitLab and Bitbucket. There is a permanently free version.
blogPost.body: With code-ray you can fix bugs in your code faster and easier. You can set breakpoints to show the live state in different sections of your code. code-ray can be linked to GitHub, GitLab and Bitbucket. There is a permanently free version.
blogPost.title: code-ray - Live debugging tool for software developers
blogPost.author: Henry Burkert
